casebody.data:
Michael Anthony SAPPINGTON and Angela Sappington, Plaintiffs,
v.
John SHOEMAKE and TST Expedited Services, Inc., Defendants,
and
Cherokee Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellant,
and
State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158823
COA: 337994 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 22, 2019.
